pr_title: don't use key property for older Qt

timeline.message: don't use key property for older Qt
use static var (no need to recompute)

timeline.bodyText: I think the idiomatic way of doing this in Java is to override compareTo for your class.
timeline.author: jmcphers
timeline.diffHunk:
